item.title: OpenStack Summit Paris 2014
item.description: November 3-7, 2014 | Paris, France Visit StackStorm at Booth E2 Talks: Monday, November 3 – #vBrownBag TechTalks 3:15 pm – Mistral: OpenStack Workflow Service (Dmitri Zimine) 4:15 pm – Operational Design Patterns (Patrick Hoolboom) Tuesday, November 4 – Sponsor Demo Theater 3:45 pm – Operating OpenStack / AWS Environments With Smart Automation (Evan Powell) EVENT WEBSITE
